taskGroup.name: Create a rich client application
taskGroup.intro:
This cheat sheet will guide you through the individual steps to create a plug-in, define a plug-in based product, customize a product, export a Rich Client Platform (RCP) application and define a feature-based product using the Plug-in Development Environment (PDE).
To assist you along the way, wizards and commands will be available for you to launch automatically.

task.name: Create a plug-in
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to create and run a minimal RCP application.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created an RCP application!

task.name: Define a plug-in based product
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to define and run a plug-in based product configuration.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just defined a plug-in based product configuration for an RCP application!

task.name: Customize a product
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to add window images, add a splash screen and customize a launcher for an RCP application.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just customized your product configuration!

task.name: Export an RCP product
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to modify a product configuration and export a standalone RCP product.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just exported a fully-branded product!

task.name: Define a feature-based product
task.intro: This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to convert a plug-in based product configuration to a feature-based one.
task.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just defined a feature-based product!

taskGroup.onCompletion: Congratulations! You just created a plug-in, defined a plug-in based product, customized a product, exported an RCP product and defined a feature-based product using PDE.
